title: La Courneuve (IDF): one more police assassination - Nouvelle Époque
description: ‌9 months after the assassination of Nahel who had ignited France in June 2023, a new young person died in vague circumstances this Wednesday, March 13 at La Courneuve (Seine Saint-Denis), the young Wanys, 18. While the police accuse him of "refusal to oppress", a surveillance video clearly shows the car of the […]
author: Missak Manouchian
